submodules.title: User Interface Design
submodules.description: An intuitive and responsive design that allows users to easily navigate through job postings, freelancer profiles, and project management tools.

submodules.title: Job Posting & Proposal UI
submodules.description: A streamlined interface for clients to post tasks and for freelancers to submit proposals, featuring real-time notifications and updates.

submodules.title: Dashboard
submodules.description: A personalized dashboard for users to track their projects, payments, and performance metrics, enhancing user engagement and satisfaction.

submodules.title: Profile Management
submodules.description: Allows freelancers to showcase their skills, portfolios, and reviews, while clients can manage their job postings and view freelancer profiles.

submodules.title: AI Job Matching Engine
submodules.description: Utilizes machine learning algorithms to match clients with the most suitable freelancers based on skills, experience, and project requirements.

submodules.title: Smart Contract Management
submodules.description: Handles the creation, execution, and management of smart contracts for escrow payments, ensuring secure and automated transactions.

submodules.title: Decentralized Reputation System
submodules.description: Implements an on-chain review system that allows users to rate and review freelancers, contributing to a transparent and trustworthy marketplace.

submodules.title: Identity Verification Integration
submodules.description: Integrates with Self Protocol to verify user identities, ensuring that freelancers and clients are legitimate and trustworthy.

submodules.title: Escrow Payment System
submodules.description: Facilitates secure transactions through smart contracts, ensuring that funds are only released upon successful completion of work.

submodules.title: Crypto Payment Gateway
submodules.description: Enables seamless transactions in various cryptocurrencies, allowing freelancers to receive payments instantly without high platform fees.

submodules.title: AI Tracking & Monitoring
submodules.description: Employs AI algorithms to track project progress and verify work completion, providing clients with real-time updates and insights.

submodules.title: Dispute Resolution System
submodules.description: Utilizes AI to analyze disputes and provide fair resolutions based on project data, user feedback, and contract terms.

submodules.title: Skill-Based Staking Mechanism
submodules.description: Allows freelancers to lock tokens as a form of verification for their skills, enhancing trust and accountability within the marketplace.

submodules.title: User Management
submodules.description: Enables administrators to manage user accounts, monitor activity, and enforce platform policies to maintain a safe and fair environment.

submodules.title: Analytics Dashboard
submodules.description: Provides insights into platform performance, user engagement, and financial metrics, helping to inform strategic decisions and improvements.
